subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: As expected, U.S. Manager Bruce Arena announced a 23-man World Cup roster that was split almost evenly between players based on European club teams and those who play domestically in Major League Soccer.
snippet: As expected, U.S. Manager Bruce Arena announced a 23-man World Cup roster that was split almost evenly between players based on European club teams and those who play domestically in Major League Soccer.
